name: Reptilian Rebellion
description: Stop the New World Order in this challenging game!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: Just no!! The game gets tough at times just because you will run out of ammo real quick due to being over run by the monsters. The game has nothing else to offer and just feels like a a lazy IOS game
